metadata.title: A4 Boy's Lacrosse Reversible Practice Jersey
features: 100% Polyester Mesh, 3.4 ounces per square yard
Moisture Wicking to Keep Athletes Cool
Stain Release and Odor Resistant for Easy Care
description: Our 3.4 ounce polyester mesh delivers excellent breathability and garment shape retention, 100% Polyester Mesh, 3.4 ounces per square yard, Moisture Wicking, Odor Resistant, Stain Release, Open bottom for screen printing, Double thickness body, Size: S, M, L, XL.
Machine wash cold with like colors. Do not bleach. Tumble dry low. Do not iron.
